pages.title: Swift Blade
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 2 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Very_Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Increases damage the faster your attack speed is. $(br)Slower weapons will deal less damage

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 200 $(br2)Attack Speed will be increased
